actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the exploration for and extraction of oil and gas in certain areas off the coast of California, and various other purposes.

summary.text: California Ocean Sanctuary Act of 1989 - Designates a specified area of the Outer Continental Shelf extending 200 miles seaward from the seaward boundary of California as the California Ocean Sanctuary, prohibiting the ocean dumping or incineration of toxic or hazardous waste within the Sanctuary. Prohibits the exploration for fossil fuels, including oil and gas leasing, in specified areas in the Sanctuary.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the exploration for and extraction of oil and gas in certain areas off the coast of California, and various other purposes.
